archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0604
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to see be able to manage (view, accept, cancel) below the line offers all self service channels, so that I can make the most of being a Vodafone customer

properties.value: Does accept mean activating the offer automatically for all subcriptions? Expected is that accept means activating a new offered option/add on (one click action) Cancel means just cancelling the add on (same as any other auto renewal add on) Details to be discussed on a dedicated session.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
